home.heading:
Leicester Maher
 Community Association
home.content:
Leicester Maher Community Association (UK) was founded in 1990. The aim of LMCA was to unite the Maher Community and promote and preserve our culture, heritage, language, and social and cultural awareness.

Our goal is to invest in the next generation—our youth—and build a strong community. As we enter the new era, we want to lead our community to new services, embrace technology, and allow our youth to participate with excitement and enthusiasm who will proudly continue to carry our heritage.

We encourage each Maher family to engage by becoming a member, participating in our activities, and helping us grow to build a stronger community.

feedback.text: We value your feedback. Let us know what you think of our community app! What is good? What could be better? Please share your thoughts; your ideas can make a difference.
